link_desc:
Template SNMP V2 agent for monitoring video projectors from EPSON. This template extends "Template Module Generic SNMPv1" already available on Zabbix 4.4.

Tested with: EPSON EB-98; EB-98H; EB-X39

Monitors these items and more:

  • Projector Firmware;
  • Projector Input Source;
  • Projector Lamp Hours;
  • Projector Name;
  • Projector Status;

17/11/2020 - Added some disaster and warning triggers related with lamp time and temperatures.

TODO: Add proper handling of SNMP traps.
tags: EPSON, source, status, projector, snmp v1, snmp v2, lamp, time, life, SEIKO
author: João Matos
